body.name: Huggies Natural Care Sensitive Baby Wipes, Unscented, Hypoallergenic, 99% Purified Water, 1 Flip-Top Pack (56 Wipes Total)
features: 1 flip-top pack of 56 Huggies Natural Care Sensitive Baby Wipes, Unscented; National Eczema Association Seal of Approval
Plant-Based Wipes since 1990: Huggies Natural Care Baby Wipes are plant-based & 99% purified water for a gentle clean
Safe for sensitive skin: hypoallergenic & dermatologically tested, unscented diaper wipes are infused with aloe & vitamin E; wipes are pH balanced to help maintain healthy skin
No harsh ingredients: free of lotions, fragrances, parabens, alcohol, dyes & elemental chlorine; does not contain phenoxyethanol or MIT
EZ Pull 1-Handed Dispensing: one-handed dispensing makes it easy to grab wipes without wasting sheets; packaging may vary from images shown
body.description: Product Description Huggies Natural Care Sensitive Baby Wipes gives your baby an extra soft and gentle clean with every wipe. Made with 99% purified water and 1% skin essential ingredients, these baby wipes have reliably offered you plant-based ingredients for over 20 years. The unique base sheet is infused with aloe and vitamin E and keeps your baby's skin clean by locking in and absorbing the mess. To help maintain healthy skin for your baby, the Huggies Natural Care unscented disposable wipes are hypoallergenic, dermatologist-tested and pH-balanced. They're recognized by the National Eczema Association because they're fragrance free, alcohol free, paraben free and do not contain phenoxyethanol or MIT, making them safe for sensitive skin. Coming in adorable Winnie-the-Pooh-inspired packaging, each wipe is extra soft and gentle, making them ideal for sensitive newborn skin. Plus, with a flip-top design and EZ Pull 1-Handed Dispensing, you can easily grab wipes without wasting sheets. With the #1 branded wipe**, you can feel confident you are giving baby a safe, gentle clean every time. Join the Huggies Rewards Powered by Fetch to get rewarded fast. Earn points on Huggies diapers and wipes, in addition to thousands of other products to redeem for hundreds of gift cards. Check out the Fetch Rewards app to get started today! (*70%+ by weight) (**Based on US Nielsen data ending 9/4/2021) Brand Story By Huggies

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Inspired by mom’s hugs to be just as gentle You have delicate skin, baby. These baby wipes are gentle enough to help keep you clean & healthy. Plant-based since 1990 Nature is pretty amazing, baby, so we use plant-based materials in our Natural Care Wipes. Keep perfect skin healthy with 99% purified water With aloe & vitamin E, our pH balanced sensitive baby wipes gently cleanse and moisturize your skin. Hypoallergenic for sensitive skin like yours, baby Accepted by the National Eczema Association, our sensitive wipes can help keep your skin healthy. What makes Huggies Natural Care Sensitive Skin Baby Wipes right for you, baby? Designed to be gentle on sensitive skin, these wipes are made with 99% purified water and are enriched with aloe vera and vitamin E. They’re even accepted by the National Eczema Association! You’re learning all about new smells, baby, and you may want to know—are these wipes scented? Huggies Natural Care Sensitive Baby Wipes are hypoallergenic and free of fragrances, lotions, parabens and dyes. If you want a delicate scent, try our Natural Care Refreshing Baby Wipes or Nourish & Care Baby Wipes. Plants are things that grow, just like you, baby. But what does it mean that our wipes are plant-based? For your delicate skin, baby, we like to keep things simple. All of Huggies baby wipes are made with at least 70% plant-based fibers by weight to ensure a gentle clean that’s free of harsh chemicals. Are these wipes easy to grab one-handed? Mom’s got her hands full, baby. But don’t worry, our wipes have EZ Pull 1-Handed Dispensing so it’s easy to grab just one wipe at a time without wasting sheets. Using the toilet is an important lesson to learn, baby, but are Huggies Baby Wipes flushable? Designed for cushiony softness and durability, Huggies baby wipes don't easily break down after flushing. Please don’t flush baby wipes, and instead use the trash bin for your wipes and diapers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: My all time favorite wipe. Strong, wet, and comes out of the dispenser one by one, so it saves money. I've tried many and this is the best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Needed wipes to my in case of emergency bag. They work great and smell fresh. Definitely do the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are great!
reviews.reviewText: Very soft, great smell and very durable. They dont tear at all. Only downside is that they arent flushable. Overall, I would highly recommend these for adults and babies!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wipes ate durable and travel well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and thick and perfect for any bottom
reviews.reviewText: We love huggies baby wipes in our household. They are thick unlike other wipes and clean very well.The only thing I would wish for is that they are flushable but I understand that pipes are to small for that.Scent is natural and they are soft on your babies bottom or your own.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Still the Best!
reviews.reviewText: I used these on my daughter when she was a baby and now that she's a teen, I still buy them. She has extreme allergic reactions to dyes and scents so I am always careful about changing brands on her. Yes, there are feminine wipes available but they don't have a thing on the reliability and soft care that Huggies has always given to my most sensitive person.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dog wipes
reviews.reviewText: Great for wiping paws and freshening pooches at the end of the day.
Product is not the issue -it is the seller who is scamming. They advertise 8 packages of 56 sheets but send you only 1. Buyer beware!!

These wipes are fantastic- we won’t use anything but. Giving a poor review, though, in hopes others will not make the same mistake I did. Seller is charging almost $15 for a single pack of wipes, not an 8 count box as advertised in the photos and description. Buyer beware. Fortunately I am able to return them.

reviews.reviewTitle: I buy this item twice but only receice 2 packs instead of 16
reviews.reviewText: I am suppose to receive 2 paquakes of 8 packs of 56 wipes because i bought this article twice but i only receive 2 backs of 56 wipes instead of receive 16 packs. 50$ for 2 packs of 56 wipes is completely innaceptable.
I only received one pack of 56 wipes. Horrible
Says a pack of 8 but be warned - only one pack arrived for $25!!! Scam?
